description:
This is the first game i published and the game jam was fun to test myself 

note: i could not do the story for this game, and there might be an issue with only the mouse lagging if someone knows how to fix that fell free to comment

i noticed spelling is not my strong suit ;-;
audio: https://freesound.org/people/kyles/sounds/455844/
city audio: https://freesound.org/people/tosha73/sounds/580527/
airvet: https://mixkit.co/free-sound-effects/metal/

music: https://twitter.com/mrdemoapple


this game jam was more about me learning new things in unity then making a game for me at least 

below is the inputs in the game for controller

mouse is to look
